attributes.action: Stop the issue of campaign medals to those in public office who visit combat zones and do not stay for the same qualifing period required by personnel of the armed forces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have been given to believe that M.Ps.And Ministers of state that visit conflict zones,are being awarded the medal applicable to the area of conflict.Most of these visits are over in a matter of hours in many cases;  occassionaly they may last a few days.The issue of medals under these circumstances is an insult to members of H.M.forces

rejection.details: I can confirm it is not true that MPs and ministers are being awarded medals following visits to conflict zones.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
